Interface WindowEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Listener

    public interface WindowEventListener
extends Listener

    • Method Detail

      • beforeWindowChangeSize

        void beforeWindowChangeSize(WebDriver driver,
                            WebDriver.Window window,
                            org.openqa.selenium.Dimension targetSize)
        This action will be performed each time before WebDriver.Window.setSize(Dimension)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        window - is the window whose size is going to be changed
        targetSize - is the new size

      • afterWindowChangeSize

        void afterWindowChangeSize(WebDriver driver,
                           WebDriver.Window window,
                           org.openqa.selenium.Dimension targetSize)
        This action will be performed each time after WebDriver.Window#setSize(Dimension)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        window - is the window whose size has been changed
        targetSize - is the new size

      • beforeWindowIsMoved

        void beforeWindowIsMoved(WebDriver driver,
                         WebDriver.Window window,
                         org.openqa.selenium.Point targetPoint)
        This action will be performed each time before WebDriver.Window#setPosition(org.openqa.selenium.Point)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        window - is the window whose position is going to be changed
        targetPoint - is the new window coordinates

      • afterWindowIsMoved

        void afterWindowIsMoved(WebDriver driver,
                        WebDriver.Window window,
                        org.openqa.selenium.Point targetPoint)
        This action will be performed each time after WebDriver.Window#setPosition(org.openqa.selenium.Point)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        window - is the window whose position has been changed
        targetPoint - is the new window coordinates

      • beforeWindowIsMaximized

        void beforeWindowIsMaximized(WebDriver driver,
                             WebDriver.Window window)
        This action will be performed each time before WebDriver.Window#maximize()
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        window - is the window which is going to be maximized

      • afterWindowIsMaximized

        void afterWindowIsMaximized(WebDriver driver,
                            WebDriver.Window window)
        This action will be performed each time after WebDriver.Window#maximize()
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        window - is the window which has been maximized
